rstansensitivity 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Check whether two stan models objects agree on draws in sampling_result.

CheckModelEquivalence.Rd

Check whether two stan models objects agree on draws in sampling_result.

CheckModelEquivalence(sampling_result, model_1, model_2, stan_data_1,
  stan_data_2, check_grads = TRUE, tol = 1e-08, max_chains = 1,
  max_num_samples = 100)

Arguments

sampling_result

Samples drawn from a Stan model, possibly distinct from model_1 and model_2.
model_1

The path to the first stan model.
model_2

The path to the second stan model.
stan_data_1

A stan data file for the first model.
stan_data_2

A stan data file for the second model.
check_grads

Whether to check the gradients of the log probabilities.
tol

The tolerance for the difference in grads and log probability.

Value

A boolean indicating whether model_1 and model_2 agree with each other on the samples specified in sampling_result. Log probability is is compared up to a constant, and the gradients are compared on the parameters in common according to the unconstrained parameter names.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
